TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit StatisticFormula extends System.Object

summary.span: 計算統計公式。

span.span: Calculates statistical formulas.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公式可以鬆散分為下列類別： 分佈，包括反向分佈。測試;和基本統計公式。Formulas can be loosely grouped into the following categories: distributions, including inverse distributions; tests; and basic statistical formulas. 每個群組有共同的特性，相對於其輸入和傳回值。Each group has common characteristics with respect to their input and return values.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova (double probability, string inputSeriesNames);
.method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.AnovaResult Anova(float64 probability, string inputSeriesNames) cil managed
Public Function Anova (probability As Double, inputSeriesNames As String) As AnovaResult
public: System::Windows::Forms::DataVisualization::Charting::AnovaResult ^ Anova(double probability, System::String ^ inputSeriesNames);

param.name: probability
param.span: Alpha 值，其為假設被拒絕的機率。

span.span: The alpha value, which is the probability that the hypothesis is rejected.
The allowable range is 0-1.

param.name: inputSeriesNames
param.span: 輸入數列名稱的逗號分隔清單。

span.span: A comma-delimited list of input series names.

summary.span: 執行 ANOVA 測試，判斷兩個以上資料群組的平均值之間是否存在統計上的顯著差異。

span.span: Performs an ANOVA test to determine whether there is a statistically significant difference between the mean values of two or more groups of data.
An object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ANOVA 測試用來測試兩個或多個資料群組的方法之間的差異。An ANOVA test is used to test the difference between the means of two or more groups of data. 必須指定兩個或多個數列資料群組，且每個數列必須有相同數目的資料點。否則，會引發例外狀況。Two or more groups of series data must be specified, and each series must have the same number of data points; otherwise, an exception will be raised. 如果指定的輸入的數列不存在於方法呼叫時，將會擲回例外狀況。If a specified input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown.

MemberSignature.Value: public double BetaFunction (double m, double n);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 BetaFunction(float64 m, float64 n) cil managed
Public Function BetaFunction (m As Double, n As Double) As Double
public: double BetaFunction(double m, double n);

span.span: The first value for the beta function.
The second value for the beta function.

summary.span: 傳回兩個指定之值的 Beta 函式值。

span.span: Returns the beta function value for two given values.

returns.span: 值，表示兩個指定之值的 Beta 函式。

span.span: A value that represents the beta function for the two given values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回兩個指定的值所指定的 beta 函式值`m`和`n`。This method returns the beta function value for two given values that are specified by `m` and `n`.

MemberSignature.Value: public double Correlation (string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName);
.method public hidebysig instance float64 Correlation(string firstInputSeriesName, string secondInputSeriesName) cil managed
Public Function Correlation (firstInputSeriesName As String, secondInputSeriesName As String) As Double
public: double Correlation(System::String ^ firstInputSeriesName, System::String ^ secondInputSeriesName);

span.span: The first input series name.
The second input series name.

summary.span: 傳回兩個資料數列的相互關聯值。

span.span: Returns the correlation value for two data series.

returns.span: 值，表示兩個資料數列之間的相互關聯。

span.span: A value that represents the correlation between two data series.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 相互關聯會測量不會受到影響的度量單位的縮放的兩個資料集之間的關聯性。Correlation measures the relationship between two data sets that are scaled to be independent of the unit of measurement. 方法傳回除以其標準差，產品的兩個資料集的共變數和一律為 1 的範圍從-1。The method returns the covariance of two data sets divided by the product of their standard deviations, and always ranges from -1 to 1. 若要判斷兩個資料範圍移動一起; 使用相互關聯也就是一組較大的值是否與其他 （正數相互關聯） 的較大的值相關聯的一組較小的值是否與其他 （負相關） 的較大的值相關聯或在兩個集合的值是否不相關的 （相互關聯近於零）。Use correlation to determine whether two ranges of data move together; that is, whether large values of one set are associated with large values of the other (positive correlation), whether small values of one set are associated with large values of the other (negative correlation), or whether values in both sets are unrelated (correlation near zero). 如果在方法呼叫的時間序列集合中指定的輸入的數列不存在，將會擲回例外狀況。If a specified input series does not exist in the series collection at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown. 如果指定之數列沒有相同數目的資料點，也會引發例外狀況。An exception will also be raised if the specified series do not have the same number of data points.

span.span: Returns the covariance value for two data series.

returns.span: 值，表示兩個資料數列之間的共異變數。

span.span: A value that represents the covariance between two data series.

param.name: probability

span.span: The alpha value, which is the probability that the hypothesis is rejected.
The allowable range is 0-1.
First degree of freedom.
Second degree of freedom.

summary.span: 傳回 F 累加分配的反向。

span.span: Returns the inverse of the F cumulative distribution.

returns.span: 來自反向 F 分配函數的 值。

span.span: A value from the inverse F distribution function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回給定的 F 分佈機率 F 值。This method returns the F value for the given F distribution probability. 比較兩個資料集可以有變化程度 F 測試可以使用 F 分佈。The F distribution can be used in an F-test that compares the degree of variability in two data sets. 這個方法可能會傳回例外狀況取決於參數值。This method may return an exception depending on the parameter values.

exception.span: 狀態：因限制而無法使用指定的參數值繼續計算。

span.span: Condition: Cannot continue calculation using specified parameter values because of limitation.

param.name: probability

The allowable range is 0-1.

summary.span: 傳回標準常態累計分佈的相反值。

span.span: Returns the inverse of the standard normal cumulative distribution.

returns.span: 反向標準常態累計分佈函式的 值。

span.span: A value from the inverse standard normal cumulative distribution function.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回給定的 F 分佈機率 F 值。This method returns the F value for the given F distribution probability. 它假設分佈有 0 （零） 的平均值和標準差的其中一個。It is assumed that the distribution has a mean of 0 (zero) and a standard deviation of one.

span.span: Input series name.

summary.span: 傳回儲存於指定數列之所有資料點的平均值。

span.span: Returns the average of all data points stored in the specified series.

returns.span: 值，表示所有資料點的平均值。

span.span: A value that represents the average of all data points.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來計算序列中的儲存點的平均值 （也就是平均）。Use this method to calculate the mean (that is, the average) of the points stored in a series. 如果指定的輸入的數列不存在於方法呼叫時，將會擲回例外狀況。If the specified input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown.

public: double Median(System::String ^ inputSeriesName);

span.span: Input series name.

summary.span: 傳回指定數列中所有資料點的中間值。

span.span: Returns the median of all data points in the specified series.
A value that represents the median.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來計算序列中的儲存點的中間值。Use this method to calculate the median of the points stored in a series. 中間值是一組範例，其中有一半之成員的大小大於而半成員的大小較小者的中間值。The median is the middle value of a sample set, where half of the members are greater in size and half the members are lesser in size. 如果指定的輸入的數列不存在於方法呼叫時，將會擲回例外狀況。If the specified input series does not exist in the at the time of the method call, an exception will be thrown.
